description: Dashboard for Spring Boot2 Statistics(by micrometer-prometheus).

targets.expr: sum by(uri) (http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$instance", status=~"2.*", uri!~".*actuator.*"}) / sum by(uri) (http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$instance", uri!~".*actuator.*"})

sum by(uri) (http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$instance", status=~"5.*", uri!~".*actuator.*"}) / sum by(uri) (http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$instance", uri!~".*actuator.*"})

sum by(uri) (http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$instance", status=~"3.*", uri!~".*actuator.*"}) / sum by(uri) (http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$instance", uri!~".*actuator.*"})

sum by(uri) (http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$instance", status=~"4.*", uri!~".*actuator.*"}) / sum by(uri) (http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$instance", uri!~".*actuator.*"})

panels.description: The percent of time spent on Garbage Collection over all CPUs assigned to the JVM process.

targets.expr: sum(rate(jvm_gc_pause_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance"}[1m])) by (application, instance) / on(application, instance) system_cpu_count

panels.title: GC Pressure

title: Spring Boot Statistics
